name: Water Raft Simulator
description:
Water Raft Simulator - Surviving in the raft and hang in as long as possible!
Beware the shark!
Imagine. You are trapped on a desert island, what would survive and return to the mainland, you had to build a wooden raft. You come out into the open sea, but there are many dangers!
Swim and go from stones, escape with the elements! The farther you uplyvesh and earn money, the more powerful and interesting raft you can buy!
Game Uniqueness:
- 3D water world.
- The crafting system store.
- Beautiful graphics.
- Free game.
- Playing without the Internet.
- And much more!
Thank you for playing with us, leave your feedback and we will improve the game in the next update!
